backend_django.handlers.authentification¶

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

checkIfUserIsLoggedIn(request)

Check whether a user is logged in or not.

loginUser(request)

Return a link for redirection to Auth0.

callbackLogin(request)

Get information back from Auth0.

getAuthInformation(request)

Return details about user after login.

logoutUser(request)

Delete session for this user and log out.

Attributes¶

oauth

backend_django.handlers.authentification.oauth¶
backend_django.handlers.authentification.checkIfUserIsLoggedIn(request)¶

Check whether a user is logged in or not.

Parameters:

request (HTTP GET) – GET request

Returns:

True if the user is logged in or False if not

Return type:

Bool

backend_django.handlers.authentification.loginUser(request)¶

Return a link for redirection to Auth0.

Parameters:

request (HTTP GET) – GET request

Returns:

HTTP Response.

Return type:

HTTP Link as str

backend_django.handlers.authentification.callbackLogin(request)¶

Get information back from Auth0. Add user to database if entry doesn’t exist.

Parameters:

request (HTTP POST) – POST request

Returns:

URL forwarding with success to frontend/user

Return type:

HTTP Link as redirect

backend_django.handlers.authentification.getAuthInformation(request)¶

Return details about user after login. Accesses the database and creates or gets user.

Parameters:

request (HTTP GET) – GET request

Returns:

User details

Return type:

Json

backend_django.handlers.authentification.logoutUser(request)¶

Delete session for this user and log out.

Parameters:

request (HTTP GET) – GET request

Returns:

URL to be forwarded

Return type:

HTTP URL
